page.title: 10FOOTBALL IN WIS. GREEN
page.content: Football is played every Saturday in winter on the village green. There are eleven players on each side in football.Usually a goalkeeper with four defenders, three midfielders and three attackers.You can use any part of your body to play, except your hands. It is a penalty in football to "handball" inside the area or if you commit a foul by tripping someone up. An offence outside the area yields a free-kick. A goal is scored by kicking the ball between two white posts and below the crossbar.If you score in the wrong goal, it is an "own goal" and is credited to the other team. There are two men's teams and a junior team in the village.
